name: SubmissionQuota
description: Maximum submissions per team/participant per submission round.  If round information is omitted, then this indicates the overall submission limit per team/participant.

firstRoundStart.description: The date/time at which the first round begins.

numberOfRounds.description: The number of rounds, or null if there is no end.

submissionLimit.description: the maximum number of submissions per team/participant per round.
